newsitem.title: ALBANIA: One dead in accident after Albanian rebels take town.
newsitem.headline: One dead in accident after Albanian rebels take town.

text.p: One person was killed and three others were wounded during a night of wild celebrations after Albanian rebels seized this southern town, hospital officials said on Sunday.
The dead and wounded were all victims of accidents after rebels and residents pillaged arms depots at a nearby army base, which has also fallen to rebel hands.
Residents pulled up at the base, just north of Gjirokaster, throughout the night. They collected hundreds of weapons and drove off.
Jubliant residents fired thousands of shots in the air and many then struggled to figure out how to reload their guns.
